Translations.Text: hajaraguvavana mattu yara munde hajaru padisalaguvudo avanane
mattu avaru visvasigalige tavu niduttiddudannu (citra hinseyannu) noduttiddaru
avaru a visvasigala virud'dha pratikaravesagalu ilidudakke, avaru (a visvasigalu) prabalanu prasansar'hanu ada allahanalli nambike ittaru embudaste karanavagittu
akasagala mattu bhumiya adhipatyavu avanige (allahanige) seride. Mattu allahanu elladakku nera saksiyagiddane
Visvasi purusaru mattu striyarannu hinsisidavaru hagu a kuritu pascattapa padadavaru – avarige narakada sikse kadide mattu avarige suduva sikse kadide
visvasigalige hagu satkarmagalannu madidavarige taladalli nadigalu hariyuva svarga totagalu siguvavu. Idu nijakku dodda saubhagyavagide
khanditavagiyu avane srsti karyavannu arambhisidavanu mattu avane adannu punaravartisuvanu (punah srstisuvanu)
